author: cbernet
body:
New version of heppy, to be included in 80X.
Another PR will follow for 81X. 

Some of our commits are touching the EgammaAnalysis/ElectronTools package. 
One of the aims of this pull request is to discuss these changes with the owners of this package.  

Cheers! 

@gpetruc @arizzi @emanueledimarco @peruzzim
title: Heppy 8 0 5
